suite.name: Solaris Performance Monitor Test
suite.description: Tests which verify the Solaris Performance Monitor functionality.

case.name: Check the information in System tab
case.description: Test will check the information listed in System tab.

case.name: Change Processes view options to My Processes in Processes tab
case.description: Test will change processes view to My Processes.

case.name: Change Processes view options to Active Processes in Processes tab
case.description: Test will change processes view to Active Processes.

case.name: Change Processes view options to All Processes in Processes tab
case.description: Test will change processes view to All Processes.

case.name: Not change the view options in Processes tab
case.description: Test will keep processes view same to last test case.

case.name: Check the information in Resources tab
case.description: Test will check the information on labels listed in Resources tab.

case.name: Open and close Preferences dialog in application
case.description: Test will try to open the application preferences dialog and then close it.
